welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nairobi, the vibrant capital city of Kenya! Get ready to experience the unique blend of urban city life and natural beauty, as you explore the bustling markets, rich culture, and stunning wildlife that Nairobi is known for. Enjoy your stay and make the most of your time here!

restaurants.name: Cafe Maghreb (Serena)
restaurants.description: Cafe Maghreb (Serena) is a eastern european restaurant located in Nairobi.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Nairobi.

restaurants.name: Java Phoenix
restaurants.description: Java Phoenix is a café located in Nairobi.

restaurants.name: Mocca Lounge & Bistro
restaurants.description: Mocca Lounge & Bistro is a café located in Nairobi.

restaurants.name: Domino's Pizza
restaurants.description: Domino's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Westlands.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilson Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wilson Airport caters to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network by requesting a password from the information desk.

terminals.name: Terminal 1A
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is the largest terminal at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is the second largest terminal at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost carriers and is the newest terminal at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.
